description: This file defines the interface IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. It declares four pure virtual methods intended for handling various events such as runtime, window, ripple, and state change events, passing JsonObject data or string identifiers as parameters.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface for handling different types of events related to runtime, window, ripple, and state change within the plugin architecture.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles runtime manager events with provided JSON data.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles window manager events with provided JSON data.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handles ripple events with a string name and JSON data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handles state change events with provided JSON data.
